entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries later this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Wednesday 12 April 2023
